import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CourseService } from '../course.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Courset } from '../model/Courset'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.css'] }) export class CoursesComponent { courses: Courset[] = []; selectedcourse: Courset | undefined; constructor(private service:CourseService,private router: Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getCourses(); } getCourses(): void { this.service.getCourses().subscribe((courses) => { this.courses = courses; }); } openModal(course: Courset): void { this.selectedcourse = course; $('#modalTitle').text(course.title); $('#modalDescription').text(course.description); $('#modalEnrollButton').click(() => { // Handle enroll button click console.log('Enroll button clicked for course:', course.title); // Add your enroll logic here }); $('#courseModal').modal('show'); // Use 'modal' method to show the modal form } closeModal(): void { $('#courseModal').modal('hide'); // Use 'modal' method to hide the modal form } }
